title: Algebra I
description: Graduate-level linear and abstract algebra including groups, finite fields, classical matrix groups and bilinear forms, multilinear algebra, and matroids. First of two courses.
restrictions: __HEADER_0__Cannot be enrolled in one of the following Levels:
__HEADER_1__Must be enrolled in one of the following Campuses:
prerequisites: MATH 4107 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D and (MATH 2406 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D or MATH 4305 Undergraduate Semester Minimum Grade of D)
